title: What’s in Our Queue? ‘Kotaro Lives Alone’ and More
title_page: What’s in Our Queue? ‘Kotaro Lives Alone’ and More - The New York Times
maintext:
What’s in Our Queue? ‘Kotaro Lives Alone’ and More Raillan Brooks �� In Brooklyn, readying for spring
Netflix
I’m a senior staff editor for Arts & Leisure.
I’m looking for broader vistas than the bus stop outside my Brooklyn window.
Here are five things I’ve been watching, reading and listening to →
